Package org.mitre.provenance.simulate.attack

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AttackGenerator
    Simple utility class for running all of the attacks and saving the results to the database.
    BaseGraph
    This is a model of a base NCEL graph, re-created in code.
    DataModificationAttack
    Attack where an extra thread is added to the graph to represent illicit modification of data, and re-injection into the workflow.
    DataStealingAttack
    Attack where one extra side-thread is added representing theft of a data item.
    DisruptionAttack
    Disruption attack where the graph is drastically cut off because resources are disrupted or taken off line.
    ManInTheMiddleAttack
    Attack where extra nodes are introduced into the graph at each junction, representing either monitoring, data stealing, etc.
    SeverAttack
    Attack where the base graph is severed into two distinct graphs by removing a single edge.
Author:
DMALLEN
